data.name: Pinball FX2 - Guardians of the Galaxy Table
data.detailed_description:
Join the Guardians of the Galaxy as they attempt to to defeat a cosmic force of epic proportions. Led by the interstellar adventurer Star-Lord, the ragtag band of outsiders, misfits and swashbucklers must defeat Ronan the Accuser, and secure the mysterious Orb in their possession.

Table features:
- Iconic characters from the film featured in full 3D, including Star-Lord, Drax the Destroyer, Ronan the Accuser and Rocket.
- Battle against Ronan's fleet of Necrocraft and engage in other key events from the film.
- Additional mini-playfield featuring the fight between Gamora and Nebula.
- A totally awesome soundtrack created especially for the pinball game.
data.about_the_game:
Join the Guardians of the Galaxy as they attempt to to defeat a cosmic force of epic proportions. Led by the interstellar adventurer Star-Lord, the ragtag band of outsiders, misfits and swashbucklers must defeat Ronan the Accuser, and secure the mysterious Orb in their possession.

Table features:
- Iconic characters from the film featured in full 3D, including Star-Lord, Drax the Destroyer, Ronan the Accuser and Rocket.
- Battle against Ronan's fleet of Necrocraft and engage in other key events from the film.
- Additional mini-playfield featuring the fight between Gamora and Nebula.

data.short_description: Join the fight against Ronan the Accuser on this frantic pinball table based on the blockbuster film, Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Spanish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8
  • Processor:Single Core CPU @ 1.6GHz
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:GeForce 6600 / Radeon 9800
  • DirectX®:9.0
  • Hard Drive:2500 MB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX compatible sound card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8
  • Processor:Dual Core CPU @ 2.00GHz
  • Memory:1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics:GeForce 8800 / Radeon HD 3850
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:3500 MB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX compatible sound card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
